version_description:
=== ScrollClip 更名为 Picsew 了！ ===

这个版本的改动：
- 保存时可以选择清晰度。
- 在预览模式下，水印也可以移动了。
- 修复bug，提高稳定性。

=== ScrollClip 更名为 Picsew 了！ ===

1.2.3:

- 添加应用内繁体中文。
- 自动选择可以保存的最佳画质。
- 修复bug。

1.2.2:

- 保存时可以选择清晰度。
- 在预览模式下，水印也可以移动了。
- 修复bug，提高稳定性。

- When selecting image, you can drag horizontally to select multiple images continuously.
- Album images order changed, now the latest image is at the bottom.
- Optimized logic of saving image.
- Optimized algorithm to improve the accuracy of long screenshot stitching.

- Redesigned the app icon.
- You can use zooming when stitching.
- All edges can be cropped, whether vertical or horizontal.
- Redesigned watermarks and added more options for watermark in settings.
- Added pixelate function.
- Added a new option: Uses the first screenshot's creation date as the saving long screenshot's creation date.
- Added a new option: Prompts you to delete the source images when finish a long screenshot stitching.

- Reduced pixelate's memory footprint.
- Optimize the experience of selecting split lines.
- Bug fixes.

Recent Update:

- Redesigned the app icon.
- You can use zooming when stitching.
- All edges can be cropped, whether vertical or horizontal.
- Redesigned watermarks and added more options for watermark in settings.
- Added pixelate function.
- Added a new option: Uses the first screenshot's creation date as the saving long screenshot's creation date.
- Added a new option: Prompts you to delete the source images when finish a long screenshot stitching.

- You can select a single image for cropping and subsequent processing.
- You can add the device shell to the final result, not limited to screenshots, supports both horizontal and vertical.
- You can add stroke lines to images.
- In the image selection view, you can use 3D Touch to preview image.
- Optimized the shadow effect of the copyright watermark.
- Optimized automatic screenshot stitching algorithm.
- bug fixes.

Recent Update:

- Redesigned the app icon.
- You can use zooming when stitching.
- All edges can be cropped, whether vertical or horizontal.
- Redesigned watermarks and added more options for watermark in settings.
- Added pixelate function.
- Added a new option: Uses the first screenshot's creation date as the saving long screenshot's creation date.
- Added a new option: Prompts you to delete the source images when finish a long screenshot stitching.

--------------------------

Your trust and support are our motivation to advance. If you like Picsew, please take a few minutes to review it or recommend it to your friends.

User Communication QQ Group: 529054088
User Feedback Email: picsewapp@gmail.com

- Automatically detect recent scrollshot when launching the app or returning the app from background.
- Added a notification center plugin that allows you to quickly save your recent scrollshot.
- Redesigned the prompt for scrollshot stitching failed.
- Redesigned the editing user interface to reduce the steps of saving.
- Improved the quality of saving scrollshot.
- Increased the accuracy of scrollshot stitching.
- bug fixes.

- Fixed the "Unable to Load" problem of the today extension.
- Added the status prompt in the today extension.
- Optimized the algorithm for scrollshot stitching.
- Added a new URL Scheme that allows you to start stitching with the most recent screenshots when opening app.
- Improved the saving image quality.
- Bug fixes.

- Added a Safari Extension called "Web Snapshot", it allows you to quickly save a full screenshot of the current web page.
- The "Use Original Creation Date" option now takes effect on the normal photo stitching.
- Optimized the saving quality of devices with small memory.
- Bug fixes.

Recent Update:
- Added a Notification Center Widget, it allows you to quickly stitch recent screenshots together without opening app.

- Adapt to iOS 11.
- Support reading iCloud sharing pictures.
- Web snapshot plugin can now be used in apps other than Safari.
- Support iPhone X screenshot size.
- Support automatic stitching for wide color gamut screenshots.
- Optimized naming of PNG file names.
- Bug fixes.

- Fix crashes on iOS 8
- Fix the problem of automatic stitching success rate decline.

Recent Update:
- Adapt to iOS 11.
- Support reading iCloud sharing pictures.
- Web snapshot plugin can now be used in apps other than Safari.
- Support iPhone X screenshot size.
- Support automatic stitching for wide color gamut screenshots.
- Optimized naming of PNG file names.
- Bug fixes.

- Increased automatic stitching success rate.
- Added a "Scroll to Bottom" button on the image list.
- Optimized the scrolling performance of the image list.

- Supports iPhone X
- iPhone X user can add iPhone X shell now.

- Fixed the problem that image is blurred after saving in iOS 11.
- Added "Prefers Saving as PNG" option.
- Added help documentation.
- Web Snapshot Extension: Improve capture speed.
- Watermark Tool: You can add watermark to each image repeatedly.

- Added "Create Scrollshot" action extension. Make it easier to create scrollshot after taking screenshots in iOS 11.
- Stitching will automatically download original images stored in the iCloud.
- Improved saving speed.

- New Feature: "Clean Status Bar" tool, automatically recognize the status bar in screenshot, change it to the unified style.
- Improve performance and stability.

- Fixed some UI layout errors.
- Improved stability.

- Added X-Callback-URL feature. Please check the document under "Settings"->"URL Schemes"->"x-callback-url". With X-Callback-URL, you can let Picsew work with productivity tools such as Workflow and Launch Center Pro!
- Fixed recognition bug in the Clean Status Bar tool.
- Optimized the scrolling performance on iPad.

Picsew has changed to "free + in-app purchase" mode, old users can upgrade for free.

Other Changes:
- New: Image Watermark
- New: Tiled Watermark
- New: Custom Status Bar
- New: App icon be changed now.
- Fix: Some share extension not works

- Fixed some tiling watermark bugs.
- Optimized error tips for Free Upgrade.

Recent Changes:
- New: Image Watermark
- New: Tiled Watermark
- New: Custom Status Bar
- New: App icon be changed now.
- Fix some bugs related to in-app purchase
